}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "youyeetoo", logo and "YY3568-CORE CV1" are silk-screened on the SoM. :"youyeetoo", logo and "YY3568-BASE V3.0" are silk-screened on the Carrier Board.
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Rockchip]] RK3568 @2.0GHz :SoC: Quad-core ARM (Cortex-A55); NPU: 0.8 TOPS *GPU: ''Mali-G52 MP2'' @650MHz (OpenGL ES3.2, OpenCL 2.0) :VPU (with 4K VP9 and 4K 10-bit H265/H264 decoding) *Storage: 16GB (eMMC) Flash, TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card *Memory: 2GB (LPDDR4X) RAM *USB: 2x USB 3.0 (Type-A), 2x USB 2.0 (Type-A) ports, :2x USB 2.0 (4-pin) ports *PCIe: 1x M.2 (E-Key) PCIe 2.0, :1x M.2 (M-Key) PCIe or SATA 3.0 (via optional adapter) *Network: 2x 1GbE ports *Power Source: 12-19V via barrel
==Links of Interest== *[https://wiki.youyeetoo.com/en/YY3568 Docs]
===Reviews=== *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2023/08/25/youyeetoo-yy3568-devkit-review-part-1-unboxing-specifications-and-android-11-testing/ ''Youyeetoo YY3568 devkit review'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[https://linuxgizmos.com/rockchip-dev-kit-comes-with-2x-gbe-and-wi-fi-bt-5-0-connectivity/ ''Rockchip dev kit comes with 2x GbE'' on '''LinuxGizmos''']
